name: qa-testing
description: QA automation testing utilities and patterns

generate-test.description: Generate tests for the specified code
generate-test.prompt: Generate comprehensive tests for the specified file using Jest/pytest and Playwright. Follow AAA pattern. Target 80%+ coverage.

review-code.description: Review code for quality and security
review-code.prompt: Review the code for quality, security vulnerabilities (OWASP Top 10), and best practices. Organize findings by severity.

create-page-object.description: Create a Playwright Page Object Model class
create-page-object.prompt: Create a TypeScript Page Object Model class for the specified page. Use data-testid selectors, include common actions, and follow Playwright best practices.
